entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is a technology company specializing in the design and manufacturing of graphics processing units (GPUs) and related technologies.

entities.name: MELLANOX
entities.description: Mellanox is a company associated with NVIDIA Corporation, particularly in the context of acquisition-related intangible assets and in-process research and development projects.

relationships.relationship_description: Mellanox is involved in an in-process research and development project valued at $630 million as part of NVIDIA Corporation's acquisition-related intangible assets.
